articles.title: Plus size creator creates petition to try and force airlines to offer larger passengers bigger seats - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jaelynn Chaney, a travel and lifestyle creator based in Vancouver, is demanding the FAA to 'protect' plus-sized travelers and make it more 'comfortable'.
articles.content:
A plus-sized influencer has demanded the Federal Aviation Authority and airlines give overweight flyers as many free seats as they require to fly comfortably.
